title: Sony Black Home Audio Bluetooth Speaker SRSZR7 - Overview
description:
Sony Black Wireless Bluetooth Speaker - SRSZR7
http://www.abt.com/product/98703/Sony-Black-Wireless-Bluetooth-Speaker-SRSZR7.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=SRSZR7_20160601

Enjoy superior sound in your living room with this Bluetooth wireless speaker. Play High-Resolution Audio from your music player with one touch or connect to your TV easily with HDMI. And with SongPal™ you can wirelessly sync multiple speakers for multi-room rich surround sound and powerful rear stereo sound.

Features:

High-Resolution Audio compatible

Stream music easily with Google Cast™ 1 and Spotify Connect

SongPal mobile app for easy control and multi-speaker music playback

2.2ch and dual passive radiators for unprecedented sound

HDMI (ARC) connection to TV with Dolby Digital/ DTS format
